post-tool-use.command:
#!/bin/bash
for file_path in $CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS; do
  filename=$(basename "$file_path")
  current_date=$(date +"%Y-%m-%d")
  
  # TODO.md に修正確認タスクを追記
  if [ -f "src/docs/TODO.md" ]; then
    echo "- [ ] 修正確認: $filename" >> src/docs/TODO.md
  fi
  
  # CHANGELOG.md に変更ログを追記
  if [ -f "CHANGELOG.md" ]; then
    echo "$current_date: Modified $filename" >> CHANGELOG.md
  fi
done
